org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block

Interface IBlockGui

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockGui, BlockTileGui

    public interface IBlockGui
    Block gui component. Pass IBlockGui.IBlockContainerProvider.get(BlockState, World, BlockPos) ass a lambda to specify the gui. Optionally implement getOpenStat() to specify a stat on gui opening.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IBlockGui.IBlockContainerProvider
